          <title>
            <string language="en">White solid and liquid mixture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Weiße feste und flüssige Mischung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mélange plein et liquide blanc</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mistura contínua e líquida branca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Miscela solida e liquida bianca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασπρο στερεό και υγρό μίγμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mezcla sólida y líquida blanca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a mixture of white solid and a liquid. The white colour of the mixture is due to the specks of solid that are big enough to scatter white light.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scatter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white specks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Mischung von weißem 
festem und von einer Flüssigkeit. Die weiße Farbe der Mischung
liegt an den Flecken des Körpers, die genug groß sind, weißes Licht
zu zerstreuen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un mélange de plein 
blanc et d'un liquide. La couleur blanche du mélange est due 
aux points du solide qui sont assez grands pour disperser la lumière 
blanche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma mistura de contínuo
branco e de um líquido. A cor branca da mistura é  devido aos 
specks do sólido que são grandes bastante dispersar a luz branca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una miscela di solido
bianco e di un liquido. Il colore bianco della miscela è dovuto
le macchiette del solido che sono abbastanza grandi spargere la luce 
bianca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα μίγμα άσπρου 
στερεού και ενός υγρού. Το άσπρο χρώμα του μίγματος 
οφείλεται specks του στερεού που είναι αρκετά μεγάλα να 
διασκορπίσουν το άσπρο φως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una mezcla de sólido 
blanco y de un líquido. El color blanco de la mezcla es debido 
a las motas del sólido que son bastante grandes dispersar la luz 
blanca.</string>
          </description>
